com.mesosphere.sdk.offer

Class DestroyOfferRecommendation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.DestroyOfferRecommendation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OfferRecommendation, UninstallRecommendation

    public class DestroyOfferRecommendation
extends java.lang.Object
implements UninstallRecommendation
    This OfferRecommendation encapsulates a Mesos DESTROY Operation.

      Returns an operation which should be sent to Mesos in response to the offer (as returned by #getOffer()), or an empty Optional if nothing should be sent to Mesos.

      Returns the Mesos resource to be unreserved or destroyed.

      • getOperation

        public java.util.Optional<Protos.Offer.Operation> getOperation()
        Description copied from interface: OfferRecommendation
        Returns an operation which should be sent to Mesos in response to the offer (as returned by #getOffer()), or an empty Optional if nothing should be sent to Mesos. The latter case can be useful for any additional bookkeeping work to be performed following a successful evaluation.
        Specified by:
        getOperation in interface OfferRecommendation
